conversation.text: Based on the user's preference cues and the genres listed, I would recommend the movie "I, Robot" (2009) directed by Alex Proyas. The movie is based on the novel of the same name written by Isaac Asimov in 1950. The movie tells the story of a group of robots who are sent to Earth as part of an experiment. When things go wrong and the robots become uncontrollable, they begin to wreak havoc across the world. In order to prevent this disaster from happening, one young woman named Susan Adams (played by Michelle Yeoh)) must use her intelligence, knowledge, and resourcefulness to devise a plan that will allow Susan to infiltrate into the secret research facility on Mars where the experiment is being conducted in order to prevent this disaster from happening.
